mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_no, id, kakao, naver, google, pw, user_name, nickname, level_point, levels, role, purpose1, purpose2, purpose3) VALUES(seq_users_user_no.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{kakao:VARCHAR}, #{naver:VARCHAR}, #{google:VARCHAR}, #{pw}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, 0, '미인증회원', 'user', #{purpose1:VARCHAR}, #{purpose2:VARCHAR}, #{purpose3:VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, user_name, nickname, email, phone, user_addr, account, level_point, levels, role, access_date, profile, kakao FROM users WHERE kakao=#{kakao}
SELECT id, pw, user_name, nickname, email, phone, user_addr, account, level_point, levels, role, access_date, profile, google FROM users WHERE google=#{google}
SELECT id, pw, user_name, nickname, email, phone, user_addr, account, level_point, levels, role, access_date, profile, kakao FROM users WHERE naver=#{naver}
SELECT id, pw, user_name, nickname, email, phone, user_addr, account, level_point, levels, role, access_date, profile, birth_date FROM users WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, pw, user_name, nickname, email, phone, user_addr, account, level_point, levels, role, access_date, profile, birth_date FROM users WHERE nickname=#{nickname}
